name: Cell Defenders - Game Jam
description:
Given the theme "Treatment", our team was given a week to create an educational game for children aged between 4-11.

Our team designed and created a tower defence game that teaches kids about the treatments for cancer, as well as the support that is there for them.

For more information about The Big C: https://www.big-c.co.uk/
